TopicTitle: Sacrifice to The Kraken: VTOL Challenge

Articles.Content:
The Church of the Holy Kraken has hired you to deliver a sacrifice to Lord Kraken!

 

You need to get a Jumbo-64 Fuel Tank, full of fuel into orbit for them. Easy...

 

Almighty Kraken has created a beautiful world in His name and the launch will respect the environment by being fully reusable. You must recover every part except the sacrificial tank.

 

Also, Wheels and Parachutes are an ABOMINATION unto the lord and shall not be used!

 

Completion is worth 100 points.

 

Recovering all parts near KSC is valuable. The following is based on your stage which lands furthest from KSC: These are not cumulative.

+5 Points for landing in the KSC Biome

+10 Points for landing on the raised area around the buildings (not the slant).

+20 Points for landing on any building or the runway.

+50 points for landing on any helipad or the Launchpad (flat top part).

Can’t return to KSC? Lose 1 point for every KM between your vessel and KSC, yes you can go negative.  

 

Double the fun:

Launch a second Jumbo-64 tank (on the same vehicle/at the same time) for double the points. Triple earns triple, etc.

 

Videos are best, photos are acceptable. No physics editing, or adding parts. DLC is fine. Mission patch for completion if this gets popular. 

 

Scoreboard:

Hmmm so... so if I remove an existing orange tank from orbit and send the entire think to an intact landing on Duna... what's the distance to Duna again? Negative times a negative.... so that's... like 20 million points, right?

(I kid), I will try this later.
